about.description:
Passionate about development, I take real pleasure in designing applications that meet concrete needs.
I focus on back-end development, particularly creating APIs and deploying them through suitable solutions.
I also pay special attention to the user interface, to provide a refined, smooth, and accessible experience.

skills.description: Technologies and tools I master to create modern web applications.
